Package br.com.concepting.framework.persistence.util

Class PersistenceUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.persistence.util.PersistenceUtil
  • public class PersistenceUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible to manipulate the persistence service.

      • getDefaultPersistenceResources

        public static PersistenceResources getDefaultPersistenceResources()
                                                           throws InvalidResourcesException
        Returns the default persistence resource.
        Returns:
        Instance that contains the persistence resources.
        Throws:
        InvalidResourcesException - Occur when the persistence resources weren't loaded.

      • getPersistenceResources

                                                    throws InvalidResourcesException
        Returns a specific persistence resource.
        Parameters:
        persistenceResourcesId - String that contains the identifier of the persistence resources.
        Returns:
        Instance that contains the persistence resources.
        Throws:
        InvalidResourcesException - Occur when the persistence resources weren't loaded.
